00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA
00032 
00033 #include <linux/kthread.h>
00034 
00035 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00036 #include <lustre_swab.h>
00037 #include <obd_class.h>
00038 
00039 #include "qmt_internal.h"
00040 
00041 /* intent policy function called from mdt_intent_opc() when the intent is of
00042  * quota type */
00043 int qmt_intent_policy(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *ld,
00044                       struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct ldlm_lock **lockp,
00045                       int flags)
00046 {
00047         struct qmt_device       *qmt = lu2qmt_dev(ld);
00048         struct ldlm_intent      *it;
00049         struct quota_body       *reqbody;
00050         struct quota_body       *repbody;
00051         struct obd_uuid         *uuid;
00052         struct lquota_lvb       *lvb;
00053         struct ldlm_resource    *res = (*lockp)->l_resource;
00054         int                      rc, lvb_len;
00055         ENTRY;
00056 
00057         req_capsule_extend(&req->rq_pill, &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_QUOTA);
00058         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB, RCL_SERVER,
00059                              ldlm_lvbo_size(*lockp));
00060 
00061         /* extract quota body and intent opc */
00062         it = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LDLM_INTENT);
00063         if (it == NULL)
00064                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00065 
00066         reqbody = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00067         if (reqbody == NULL)
00068                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00069 
00070         /* prepare reply */
00071         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00072         if (rc != 0) {
00073                 CERROR("Can't pack response, rc %d\n", rc);
00074                 RETURN(err_serious(rc));
00075         }
00076 
00077         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00078         if (repbody == NULL)
00079                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00080 
00081         uuid = &(*lockp)->l_export->exp_client_uuid;
00082         switch (it->opc) {
00083 
00084         case IT_QUOTA_DQACQ: {
00085                 struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00086                 struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
00087 
00088                 if (res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_QUOTA_SEQ_OFF] == 0)
00089                         /* acquire on global lock? something is wrong ... */
00090                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00091 
00092                 /* verify global lock isn't stale */
00093                 if (!lustre_handle_is_used(&reqbody->qb_glb_lockh))
00094                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOLCK);
00095 
00096                 lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&reqbody->qb_glb_lockh);
00097                 if (lock == NULL)
00098                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOLCK);
00099                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00100 
00101                 lqe = res->lr_lvb_data;
00102                 LASSERT(lqe != NULL);
00103                 lqe_getref(lqe);
00104 
00105                 /* acquire quota space */
00106                 rc = qmt_dqacq0(env, lqe, qmt, uuid, reqbody->qb_flags,
00107                                 reqbody->qb_count, reqbody->qb_usage,
00108                                 repbody);
00109                 lqe_putref(lqe);
00110                 if (rc)
00111                         GOTO(out, rc);
00112                 break;
00113         }
00114 
00115         case IT_QUOTA_CONN:
00116                 /* new connection from slave */
00117 
00118                 if (res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_QUOTA_SEQ_OFF] != 0)
00119                         /* connection on per-ID lock? something is wrong ... */
00120                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00121 
00122                 rc = qmt_pool_new_conn(env, qmt, &reqbody->qb_fid,
00123                                        &repbody->qb_slv_fid,
00124                                        &repbody->qb_slv_ver, uuid);
00125                 if (rc)
00126                         GOTO(out, rc);
00127                 break;
00128 
00129         default:
00130                 CERROR("%s: invalid intent opcode: "LPU64"\n", qmt->qmt_svname,
00131                        it->opc);
00132                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-EINVAL));
00133         }
00134 
00135         /* on success, pack lvb in reply */
00136         lvb = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB);
00137         lvb_len = ldlm_lvbo_size(*lockp);
00138         lvb_len = ldlm_lvbo_fill(*lockp, lvb, lvb_len);
00139         if (lvb_len < 0)
00140                 GOTO(out, rc = lvb_len);
00141 
00142         req_capsule_shrink(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB, lvb_len, RCL_SERVER);
00143         EXIT;
00144 out:
00145         return rc;
00146 }
00147 
00148 /*
00149  * Initialize quota LVB associated with quota indexes.
00150  * Called with res->lr_lvb_sem held
00151  */
00152 int qmt_lvbo_init(struct lu_device *ld, struct ldlm_resource *res)
00153 {
00154         struct lu_env           *env;
00155         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti;
00156         struct qmt_device       *qmt = lu2qmt_dev(ld);
00157         int                      pool_id, pool_type, qtype;
00158         int                      rc;
00159         ENTRY;
00160 
00161         LASSERT(res != NULL);
00162 
00163         if (res->lr_type != LDLM_PLAIN)
00164                 RETURN(-ENOTSUPP);
00165 
00166         if (res->lr_lvb_data ||
00167             res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_SEQ_OFF] != FID_SEQ_QUOTA_GLB)
00168                 RETURN(0);
00169 
00170         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00171         if (env == NULL)
00172                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00173 
00174         /* initialize environment */
00175         rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00176         if (rc != 0)
00177                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00178         qti = qmt_info(env);
00179 
00180         /* extract global index FID and quota identifier */
00181         fid_extract_from_quota_res(&qti->qti_fid, &qti->qti_id, &res->lr_name);
00182 
00183         /* sanity check the global index FID */
00184         rc = lquota_extract_fid(&qti->qti_fid, &pool_id, &pool_type, &qtype);
00185         if (rc) {
00186                 CERROR("can't extract pool information from FID "DFID"\n",
00187                        PFID(&qti->qti_fid));
00188                 GOTO(out, rc);
00189         }
00190 
00191         if (res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_QUOTA_SEQ_OFF] != 0) {
00192                 /* no ID quota lock associated with UID/GID 0 or with a seq 0,
00193                  * we are thus dealing with an ID lock. */
00194                 struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00195 
00196                 /* Find the quota entry associated with the quota id */
00197                 lqe = qmt_pool_lqe_lookup(env, qmt, pool_id, pool_type, qtype,
00198                                           &qti->qti_id);
00199                 if (IS_ERR(lqe))
00200                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(lqe));
00201 
00202                 /* store reference to lqe in lr_lvb_data */
00203                 res->lr_lvb_data = lqe;
00204                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "initialized res lvb");
00205         } else {
00206                 struct dt_object        *obj;
00207 
00208                 /* lookup global index */
00209                 obj = dt_locate(env, qmt->qmt_child, &qti->qti_fid);
00210                 if (IS_ERR(obj))
00211                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
00212                 if (!dt_object_exists(obj)) {
00213                         lu_object_put(env, &obj->do_lu);
00214                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 /* store reference to global index object in lr_lvb_data */
00218                 res->lr_lvb_data = obj;
00219                 CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, DFID" initialized lvb\n", PFID(&qti->qti_fid));
00220         }
00221 
00222         res->lr_lvb_len = sizeof(struct lquota_lvb);
00223         EXIT;
00224 out:
00225         lu_env_fini(env);
00226 out_free:
00227         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00228         return rc;
00229 }
00230 
00231 /*
00232  * Update LVB associated with the global quota index.
00233  * This function is called from the DLM itself after a glimpse callback, in this
00234  * case valid ptlrpc request is passed.
00235  */
00236 int qmt_lvbo_update(struct lu_device *ld, struct ldlm_resource *res,
00237                     struct ptlrpc_request *req, int increase_only)
00238 {
00239         struct lu_env           *env;
00240         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti;
00241         struct qmt_device       *qmt = lu2qmt_dev(ld);
00242         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00243         struct lquota_lvb       *lvb;
00244         struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
00245         struct obd_export       *exp;
00246         int                      rc = 0;
00247         ENTRY;
00248 
00249         LASSERT(res != NULL);
00250 
00251         if (req == NULL)
00252                 RETURN(0);
00253 
00254         if (res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_QUOTA_SEQ_OFF] == 0)
00255                 /* no need to update lvb for global quota locks */
00256                 RETURN(0);
00257 
00258         lvb = req_capsule_server_swab_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_DLM_LVB,
00259                                           lustre_swab_lquota_lvb);
00260         if (lvb == NULL) {
00261                 CERROR("%s: failed to extract lvb from request\n",
00262                        qmt->qmt_svname);
00263                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
00264         }
00265 
00266         lqe = res->lr_lvb_data;
00267         LASSERT(lqe != NULL);
00268         lqe_getref(lqe);
00269 
00270         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "releasing:"LPU64" may release:"LPU64,
00271                      lvb->lvb_id_rel, lvb->lvb_id_may_rel);
00272 
00273         if (lvb->lvb_id_rel == 0) {
00274                 /* nothing to release */
00275                 if (lvb->lvb_id_may_rel != 0)
00276                         /* but might still release later ... */
00277                         lqe->lqe_may_rel += lvb->lvb_id_may_rel;
00278                 GOTO(out_lqe, rc = 0);
00279         }
00280 
00281         /* allocate environement */
00282         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00283         if (env == NULL)
00284                 GOTO(out_lqe, rc = -ENOMEM);
00285 
00286         /* initialize environment */
00287         rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00288         if (rc)
00289                 GOTO(out_env, rc);
00290         qti = qmt_info(env);
00291 
00292         /* The request is a glimpse callback which was sent via the
00293          * reverse import to the slave. What we care about here is the
00294          * export associated with the slave and req->rq_export is
00295          * definitely not what we are looking for (it is actually set to
00296          * NULL here).
00297          * Therefore we extract the lock from the request argument
00298          * and use lock->l_export. */
00299         lock = ldlm_request_lock(req);
00300         if (IS_ERR(lock)) {
00301                 CERROR("%s: failed to get lock from request!\n",
00302                        qmt->qmt_svname);
00303                 GOTO(out_env_init, rc = PTR_ERR(lock));
00304         }
00305 
00306         exp = class_export_get(lock->l_export);
00307         if (exp == NULL) {
00308                 CERROR("%s: failed to get export from lock!\n",
00309                        qmt->qmt_svname);
00310                 GOTO(out_env_init, rc = -EFAULT);
00311         }
00312 
00313         /* release quota space */
00314         rc = qmt_dqacq0(env, lqe, qmt, &exp->exp_client_uuid,
00315                         QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REL, lvb->lvb_id_rel, 0, &qti->qti_body);
00316         if (rc || qti->qti_body.qb_count != lvb->lvb_id_rel)
00317                 LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "failed to release quota space on glimpse "
00318                              LPU64"!="LPU64" rc:%d\n", qti->qti_body.qb_count,
00319                              lvb->lvb_id_rel, rc);
00320         class_export_put(exp);
00321         if (rc)
00322                 GOTO(out_env_init, rc);
00323         EXIT;
00324 out_env_init:
00325         lu_env_fini(env);
00326 out_env:
00327         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00328 out_lqe:
00329         lqe_putref(lqe);
00330         return rc;
00331 }
00332 
00333 /*
00334  * Report size of lvb to ldlm layer in order to allocate lvb buffer
00335  * As far as quota locks are concerned, the size is static and is the same
00336  * for both global and per-ID locks which shares the same lvb format.
00337  */
00338 int qmt_lvbo_size(struct lu_device *ld, struct ldlm_lock *lock)
00339 {
00340         return sizeof(struct lquota_lvb);
00341 }
00342 
00343 /*
00344  * Fill request buffer with quota lvb
00345  */
00346 int qmt_lvbo_fill(struct lu_device *ld, struct ldlm_lock *lock, void *lvb,
00347                   int lvblen)
00348 {
00349         struct ldlm_resource    *res = lock->l_resource;
00350         struct lquota_lvb       *qlvb = lvb;
00351         ENTRY;
00352 
00353         LASSERT(res != NULL);
00354 
00355         if (res->lr_type != LDLM_PLAIN || res->lr_lvb_data == NULL ||
00356             res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_SEQ_OFF] != FID_SEQ_QUOTA_GLB)
00357                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00358 
00359         if (res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_QUOTA_SEQ_OFF] != 0) {
00360                 /* no ID quota lock associated with UID/GID 0 or with a seq 0,
00361                  * we are thus dealing with an ID lock. */
00362                 struct lquota_entry     *lqe = res->lr_lvb_data;
00363 
00364                 /* return current qunit value & edquot flags in lvb */
00365                 lqe_getref(lqe);
00366                 qlvb->lvb_id_qunit = lqe->lqe_qunit;
00367                 qlvb->lvb_flags = 0;
00368                 if (lqe->lqe_edquot)
00369                         qlvb->lvb_flags = LQUOTA_FL_EDQUOT;
00370                 lqe_putref(lqe);
00371         } else {
00372                 /* global quota lock */
00373                 struct lu_env           *env;
00374                 int                      rc;
00375                 struct dt_object        *obj = res->lr_lvb_data;
00376 
00377                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00378                 if (env == NULL)
00379                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00380 
00381                 /* initialize environment */
00382                 rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_LOCAL);
00383                 if (rc) {
00384                         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00385                         RETURN(rc);
00386                 }
00387 
00388                 /* return current version of global index */
00389                 qlvb->lvb_glb_ver = dt_version_get(env, obj);
00390 
00391                 lu_env_fini(env);
00392                 OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00393         }
00394 
00395         RETURN(sizeof(struct lquota_lvb));
00396 }
00397 
00398 /*
00399  * Free lvb associated with a given ldlm resource
00400  * we don't really allocate a lvb, lr_lvb_data just points to
00401  * the appropriate backend structures.
00402  */
00403 int qmt_lvbo_free(struct lu_device *ld, struct ldlm_resource *res)
00404 {
00405         ENTRY;
00406 
00407         if (res->lr_lvb_data == NULL)
00408                 RETURN(0);
00409 
00410         if (res->lr_name.name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_QUOTA_SEQ_OFF] != 0) {
00411                 struct lquota_entry     *lqe = res->lr_lvb_data;
00412 
00413                 /* release lqe reference */
00414                 lqe_putref(lqe);
00415         } else {
00416                 struct dt_object        *obj = res->lr_lvb_data;
00417                 struct lu_env           *env;
00418                 int                      rc;
00419 
00420                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00421                 if (env == NULL)
00422                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00423 
00424                 /* initialize environment */
00425                 rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_LOCAL);
00426                 if (rc) {
00427                         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00428                         RETURN(rc);
00429                 }
00430 
00431                 /* release object reference */
00432                 lu_object_put(env, &obj->do_lu);
00433                 lu_env_fini(env);
00434                 OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00435         }
00436 
00437         res->lr_lvb_data = NULL;
00438         res->lr_lvb_len  = 0;
00439 
00440         RETURN(0);
00441 }
00442 
00443 typedef int (*qmt_glimpse_cb_t)(const struct lu_env *, struct qmt_device *,
00444                                 struct obd_uuid *, union ldlm_gl_desc *,
00445                                 void *);
00446 /*
00447  * Send glimpse callback to slaves holding a lock on resource \res.
00448  * This is used to notify slaves of new quota settings or to claim quota space
00449  * back.
00450  *
00451  * \param env  - is the environment passed by the caller
00452  * \param qmt  - is the quota master target
00453  * \param res  - is the dlm resource associated with the quota object
00454  * \param desc - is the glimpse descriptor to pack in glimpse callback
00455  * \param cb   - is the callback function called on every lock and determine
00456  *               whether a glimpse should be issued
00457  * \param arg  - is an opaq parameter passed to the callback function
00458  */
00459 static int qmt_glimpse_lock(const struct lu_env *env, struct qmt_device *qmt,
00460                             struct ldlm_resource *res, union ldlm_gl_desc *desc,
00461                             qmt_glimpse_cb_t cb, void *arg)
00462 {
00463         struct list_head *tmp, *pos;
00464         struct list_head gl_list = LIST_HEAD_INIT(gl_list);
00465         int              rc = 0;
00466         ENTRY;
00467 
00468         lock_res(res);
00469         /* scan list of granted locks */
00470         list_for_each(pos, &res->lr_granted) {
00471                 struct ldlm_glimpse_work        *work;
00472                 struct ldlm_lock                *lock;
00473                 struct obd_uuid                 *uuid;
00474 
00475                 lock = list_entry(pos, struct ldlm_lock, l_res_link);
00476                 LASSERT(lock->l_export);
00477                 uuid = &lock->l_export->exp_client_uuid;
00478 
00479                 if (cb != NULL) {
00480                         rc = cb(env, qmt, uuid, desc, arg);
00481                         if (rc == 0)
00482                                 /* slave should not be notified */
00483                                 continue;
00484                         if (rc < 0)
00485                                 /* something wrong happened, we still notify */
00486                                 CERROR("%s: callback function failed to "
00487                                        "determine whether slave %s should be "
00488                                        "notified (%d)\n", qmt->qmt_svname,
00489                                        obd_uuid2str(uuid), rc);
00490                 }
00491 
00492                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(work);
00493                 if (work == NULL) {
00494                         CERROR("%s: failed to notify %s\n", qmt->qmt_svname,
00495                                obd_uuid2str(uuid));
00496                         continue;
00497                 }
00498 
00499                 list_add_tail(&work->gl_list, &gl_list);
00500                 work->gl_lock  = LDLM_LOCK_GET(lock);
00501                 work->gl_flags = 0;
00502                 work->gl_desc  = desc;
00503 
00504         }
00505         unlock_res(res);
00506 
00507         if (list_empty(&gl_list)) {
00508                 CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: nobody to notify\n", qmt->qmt_svname);
00509                 RETURN(0);
00510         }
00511 
00512         /* issue glimpse callbacks to all connected slaves */
00513         rc = ldlm_glimpse_locks(res, &gl_list);
00514 
00515         list_for_each_safe(pos, tmp, &gl_list) {
00516                 struct ldlm_glimpse_work *work;
00517 
00518                 work = list_entry(pos, struct ldlm_glimpse_work, gl_list);
00519 
00520                 list_del(&work->gl_list);
00521                 CERROR("%s: failed to notify %s of new quota settings\n",
00522                        qmt->qmt_svname,
00523                        obd_uuid2str(&work->gl_lock->l_export->exp_client_uuid));
00524                 LDLM_LOCK_RELEASE(work->gl_lock);
00525                 OBD_FREE_PTR(work);
00526         }
00527 
00528         RETURN(rc);
00529 }
00530 
00531 /*
00532  * Send glimpse request to all global quota locks to push new quota setting to
00533  * slaves.
00534  *
00535  * \param env - is the environment passed by the caller
00536  * \param lqe - is the lquota entry which has new settings
00537  * \param ver - is the version associated with the setting change
00538  */
00539 void qmt_glb_lock_notify(const struct lu_env *env, struct lquota_entry *lqe,
00540                          __u64 ver)
00541 {
00542         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti = qmt_info(env);
00543         struct qmt_pool_info    *pool = lqe2qpi(lqe);
00544         struct ldlm_resource    *res = NULL;
00545         int                      rc;
00546         ENTRY;
00547 
00548         lquota_generate_fid(&qti->qti_fid, pool->qpi_key & 0x0000ffff,
00549                             pool->qpi_key >> 16, lqe->lqe_site->lqs_qtype);
00550 
00551         /* send glimpse callback to notify slaves of new quota settings */
00552         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_id        = lqe->lqe_id;
00553         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_flags     = 0;
00554         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_hardlimit = lqe->lqe_hardlimit;
00555         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_softlimit = lqe->lqe_softlimit;
00556         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_time      = lqe->lqe_gracetime;
00557         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_ver       = ver;
00558 
00559         /* look up ldlm resource associated with global index */
00560         fid_build_reg_res_name(&qti->qti_fid, &qti->qti_resid);
00561         res = ldlm_resource_get(pool->qpi_qmt->qmt_ns, NULL, &qti->qti_resid,
00562                                 LDLM_PLAIN, 0);
00563         if (IS_ERR(res)) {
00564                 /* this might happen if no slaves have enqueued global quota
00565                  * locks yet */
00566                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "failed to lookup ldlm resource associated "
00567                              "with "DFID, PFID(&qti->qti_fid));
00568                 RETURN_EXIT;
00569         }
00570 
00571         rc = qmt_glimpse_lock(env, pool->qpi_qmt, res, &qti->qti_gl_desc,
00572                               NULL, NULL);
00573         ldlm_resource_putref(res);
00574         EXIT;
00575 }
00576 
00577 /* Callback function used to select locks that should be glimpsed when
00578  * broadcasting the new qunit value */
00579 static int qmt_id_lock_cb(const struct lu_env *env, struct qmt_device *qmt,
00580                           struct obd_uuid *uuid, union ldlm_gl_desc *desc,
00581                           void *arg)
00582 {
00583         struct obd_uuid *slv_uuid = arg;
00584 
00585         if (slv_uuid != NULL && obd_uuid_equals(uuid, slv_uuid))
00586                 RETURN(0);
00587         RETURN(+1);
00588 }
00589 
00590 /*
00591  * Send glimpse request on per-ID lock to push new qunit value to slave.
00592  *
00593  * \param env  - is the environment passed by the caller
00594  * \param qmt  - is the quota master target device
00595  * \param lqe  - is the lquota entry with the new qunit value
00596  * \param uuid - is the uuid of the slave acquiring space, if any
00597  */
00598 static void qmt_id_lock_glimpse(const struct lu_env *env,
00599                                 struct qmt_device *qmt,
00600                                 struct lquota_entry *lqe, struct obd_uuid *uuid)
00601 {
00602         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti = qmt_info(env);
00603         struct qmt_pool_info    *pool = lqe2qpi(lqe);
00604         struct ldlm_resource    *res = NULL;
00605         int                      rc;
00606         ENTRY;
00607 
00608         if (!lqe->lqe_enforced)
00609                 RETURN_EXIT;
00610 
00611         lquota_generate_fid(&qti->qti_fid, pool->qpi_key & 0x0000ffff,
00612                             pool->qpi_key >> 16, lqe->lqe_site->lqs_qtype);
00613         fid_build_quota_res_name(&qti->qti_fid, &lqe->lqe_id, &qti->qti_resid);
00614         res = ldlm_resource_get(qmt->qmt_ns, NULL, &qti->qti_resid, LDLM_PLAIN,
00615                                 0);
00616         if (IS_ERR(res)) {
00617                 /* this might legitimately happens if slaves haven't had the
00618                  * opportunity to enqueue quota lock yet. */
00619                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "failed to lookup ldlm resource for per-ID "
00620                              "lock "DFID, PFID(&qti->qti_fid));
00621                 lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00622                 if (lqe->lqe_revoke_time == 0 &&
00623                     lqe->lqe_qunit == pool->qpi_least_qunit)
00624                         lqe->lqe_revoke_time = cfs_time_current_64();
00625                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00626                 RETURN_EXIT;
00627         }
00628 
00629         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00630         /* The purpose of glimpse callback on per-ID lock is twofold:
00631          * - notify slaves of new qunit value and hope they will release some
00632          *   spare quota space in return
00633          * - notify slaves that master ran out of quota space and there is no
00634          *   need to send acquire request any more until further notice */
00635 
00636         /* fill glimpse descriptor with lqe settings */
00637         if (lqe->lqe_edquot)
00638                 qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_flags = LQUOTA_FL_EDQUOT;
00639         else
00640                 qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_flags = 0;
00641         qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_qunit = lqe->lqe_qunit;
00642 
00643         if (lqe->lqe_revoke_time == 0 &&
00644             qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_qunit == pool->qpi_least_qunit)
00645                 /* reset lqe_may_rel, it will be updated on glimpse callback
00646                  * replies if needed */
00647                 lqe->lqe_may_rel = 0;
00648 
00649         /* The rebalance thread is the only thread which can issue glimpses */
00650         LASSERT(!lqe->lqe_gl);
00651         lqe->lqe_gl = true;
00652         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00653 
00654         /* issue glimpse callback to slaves */
00655         rc = qmt_glimpse_lock(env, qmt, res, &qti->qti_gl_desc,
00656                               uuid ? qmt_id_lock_cb : NULL, (void *)uuid);
00657 
00658         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00659         if (lqe->lqe_revoke_time == 0 &&
00660             qti->qti_gl_desc.lquota_desc.gl_qunit == pool->qpi_least_qunit &&
00661             lqe->lqe_qunit == pool->qpi_least_qunit) {
00662                 lqe->lqe_revoke_time = cfs_time_current_64();
00663                 qmt_adjust_edquot(lqe, cfs_time_current_sec());
00664         }
00665         LASSERT(lqe->lqe_gl);
00666         lqe->lqe_gl = false;
00667         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00668 
00669         ldlm_resource_putref(res);
00670         EXIT;
00671 }
00672 
00673 /*
00674  * Schedule a glimpse request on per-ID locks to push new qunit value or
00675  * edquot flag to quota slaves.
00676  *
00677  * \param qmt  - is the quota master target device
00678  * \param lqe  - is the lquota entry with the new qunit value
00679  */
00680 void qmt_id_lock_notify(struct qmt_device *qmt, struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00681 {
00682         bool    added = false;
00683         ENTRY;
00684 
00685         lqe_getref(lqe);
00686         spin_lock(&qmt->qmt_reba_lock);
00687         if (!qmt->qmt_stopping && list_empty(&lqe->lqe_link)) {
00688                 list_add_tail(&lqe->lqe_link, &qmt->qmt_reba_list);
00689                 added = true;
00690         }
00691         spin_unlock(&qmt->qmt_reba_lock);
00692 
00693         if (added)
00694                 wake_up(&qmt->qmt_reba_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
00695         else
00696                 lqe_putref(lqe);
00697         EXIT;
00698 }
00699 
00700 /*
00701  * The rebalance thread is in charge of sending glimpse callbacks on per-ID
00702  * quota locks owned by slaves in order to notify them of:
00703  * - a qunit shrink in which case slaves might release quota space back in
00704  *   glimpse reply.
00705  * - set/clear edquot flag used to cache the "quota exhausted" state of the
00706  *   master. When the flag is set, slaves know that there is no need to
00707  *   try to acquire quota from the master since this latter has already
00708  *   distributed all the space.
00709  */
00710 static int qmt_reba_thread(void *arg)
00711 {
00712         struct qmt_device       *qmt = (struct qmt_device *)arg;
00713         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &qmt->qmt_reba_thread;
00714         struct l_wait_info       lwi = { 0 };
00715         struct lu_env           *env;
00716         struct lquota_entry     *lqe, *tmp;
00717         int                      rc;
00718         ENTRY;
00719 
00720         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00721         if (env == NULL)
00722                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00723 
00724         rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00725         if (rc) {
00726                 CERROR("%s: failed to init env.", qmt->qmt_svname);
00727                 OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00728                 RETURN(rc);
00729         }
00730 
00731         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_RUNNING);
00732         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00733 
00734         while (1) {
00735                 l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00736                              !list_empty(&qmt->qmt_reba_list) ||
00737                              !thread_is_running(thread), &lwi);
00738 
00739                 spin_lock(&qmt->qmt_reba_lock);
00740                 list_for_each_entry_safe(lqe, tmp, &qmt->qmt_reba_list,
00741                                          lqe_link) {
00742                         list_del_init(&lqe->lqe_link);
00743                         spin_unlock(&qmt->qmt_reba_lock);
00744 
00745                         if (thread_is_running(thread))
00746                                 qmt_id_lock_glimpse(env, qmt, lqe, NULL);
00747 
00748                         lqe_putref(lqe);
00749                         spin_lock(&qmt->qmt_reba_lock);
00750                 }
00751                 spin_unlock(&qmt->qmt_reba_lock);
00752 
00753                 if (!thread_is_running(thread))
00754                         break;
00755         }
00756         lu_env_fini(env);
00757         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00758         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPED);
00759         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00760         RETURN(rc);
00761 }
00762 
00763 /*
00764  * Start rebalance thread. Called when the QMT is being setup
00765  */
00766 int qmt_start_reba_thread(struct qmt_device *qmt)
00767 {
00768         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &qmt->qmt_reba_thread;
00769         struct l_wait_info       lwi    = { 0 };
00770         struct task_struct              *task;
00771         ENTRY;
00772 
00773         task = kthread_run(qmt_reba_thread, (void *)qmt,
00774                                "qmt_reba_%s", qmt->qmt_svname);
00775         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
00776                 CERROR("%s: failed to start rebalance thread (%ld)\n",
00777                        qmt->qmt_svname, PTR_ERR(task));
00778                 thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPED);
00779                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(task));
00780         }
00781 
00782         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00783                      thread_is_running(thread) || thread_is_stopped(thread),
00784                      &lwi);
00785 
00786         RETURN(0);
00787 }
00788 
00789 /*
00790  * Stop rebalance thread. Called when the QMT is about to shutdown.
00791  */
00792 void qmt_stop_reba_thread(struct qmt_device *qmt)
00793 {
00794         struct ptlrpc_thread *thread = &qmt->qmt_reba_thread;
00795 
00796         if (!thread_is_stopped(thread)) {
00797                 struct l_wait_info lwi = { 0 };
00798 
00799                 thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPING);
00800                 wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00801 
00802                 l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq, thread_is_stopped(thread),
00803                              &lwi);
00804         }
00805         LASSERT(list_empty(&qmt->qmt_reba_list));
00806 }
